text: Babye leto (, meaning 'Indian Summer'), is an album by the Russian band Leningrad, released in 2006. ==Track listing== #"По пабам" - Po pabam (To pubs) - 2:27 #"Любовь" - Lyubov (Love) - 2:32 #"Карлсон" - Karlson - 2:18 #"Дача" - Dacha (Cottage) - 3:02 #"Губошлёп" - Guboshlyop (Bullshitter) - 2:48 #"Без мата"- Bez mata (Without swearing) - 2:17 #"Высоко и низко" - Vysoko i nizko (High and low) - 2:43 #"Никулин" - Nikulin - 2:46 #"Лайф из фак" - Layf iz fak (Russian transliteration of "Life is fuck") - 2:25 #"Когда есть деньги" - Kogda est dengi (When there's money)- 2:28 #"В воду" - V vodu (Into the water) - 2:19 #"Пару баб" - Paru bab (Some bitches) - 2:55 #"Внедорожник" - Vnedorozhnik (Off-road vehicle) - 3:07 #"По-любому" - Po-lyubomu (Definitely) - 2:54 #"Женьщины" - Zhenshchiny (Women) - 1:53 #"П и Х" - P i H (abbreviation of Пизда и Хуй (Pizda i Huy) - Cunt & Dick) - 3:15 Category:2006 albums Category:Leningrad (band) albums
title: Babye leto
